p: The IDA methods were not only used for the examination of determinants that change CO2, but also for the identification of factors that affect energy efficiency. Adopting the LMDI approach, Shahiduzzaman and Alam (2013) decomposed the energy intensity in Australia over the period 1978–2009. The impacts of three identifiers on energy intensity were considered, namely, energy efficiency, fuel mix, and structure effect, in accordance with the sector-level and sub-sector level. The authors reported that energy efficiency and the structure effect were the two factors that reduced Australia's energy intensity in the reviewed period.
